title: Dependent on FTTW
body:
I'm building a package dependent on FFTW, and it seems like it's breaking in reference to fftw files. The little excerpt below is from `spack-build.out`
```
api.c:(.text+0x58d3): undefined reference to `fftw_map_r2r_kind'
 52 /home/jiseung/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/fftw-3.3.6-pl2-ct    r3yzsrpnoqdf63arcs4gzjnaz44f7s/lib/libfftw3_mpi.a(api.o): In function `fftw_    mpi_plan_r2r_2d':
 53 api.c:(.text+0x5cd1): undefined reference to `fftw_map_r2r_kind'
 54 /home/jiseung/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/fftw-3.3.6-pl2-ct    r3yzsrpnoqdf63arcs4gzjnaz44f7s/lib/libfftw3_mpi.a(api.o): In function `fftw_    mpi_plan_r2r_3d':
 55 api.c:(.text+0x5f0c): undefined reference to `fftw_map_r2r_kind'
 56 /home/jiseung/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/fftw-3.3.6-pl2-ct    r3yzsrpnoqdf63arcs4gzjnaz44f7s/lib/libfftw3_mpi.a(api.o): In function `fftw_    mpi_execute_dft':
 57 api.c:(.text+0x7631): undefined reference to `fftw_execute_r2r'
 58 /home/jiseung/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/fftw-3.3.6-pl2-ct    r3yzsrpnoqdf63arcs4gzjnaz44f7s/lib/libfftw3_mpi.a(api.o): In function `fftw_    mpi_execute_dft_r2c':
```
Why would this happen?
